body.name: CR2032 3V Lithium Battery (40pcs), Compatible with AirTag, Key Fobs, Smart Sensors, Scales, Candles and More
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 10 hrs 8 mins
features: High Capacity: 240 mAh of charge provides long-lasting power, 30% more than conventional button cells
Premium Quality: fresh, stable voltage 3V, high capacity, long-lasting, 5 year shelf-life
Safe & Sustainable: leak-free and mercury-free, manufactured with nickel plating, following the highest quality standards

Applicable Devices: ideal for various remote controls, car/key fobs, lights, weight/kitchen scales, security alarms/cameras, calculators, watches, toys, wearable technology(3D glasses), medical devices(heart rate monitors) and more every devices and specialty tools

Compatibility: works in devices using 2032, BR2032, CR2032BP, DJ2032, DL2032, EA2032C, ECR2032, E-CR2032, KCR2032, LM2032, 5004LC, 5004LB, L14, SB-T15, EA-2032C, L2032, KL2032, KECR2032, GPCR2032, KT-CR2032
body.description: PGSONIC is a long-standing brand that offers powerful and durable lithium batteries to customers from global market. Your devices will have high performance when powered by our high-capacity product. In this product, every battery has individual cell for safety, easy storage and long shelf life. Please follow instructions on the back of the package to properly use and store batteries. Under good storage conditions, our batteries hold 100% power for 5 years. A ‘Best If Used By’ Date is determined to be 5 years after manufacture and is specified on the back of the package. Feel free to ask questions about and ask for product support. We welcome your valuable feedbacks and reviews!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Batteries and Batteries
reviews.reviewText: So far so good !!! These are THE most prevalent batteries needed I my household, outside of AAA's that is. Everything small uses these. Flashlights, scopes, GPS tracker, Red Dots, Glucose meter, clocks, you name it, I can't go without these. This is a great deal on a bulk amount. I am very hopeful the battery life on these will last as long as what I usually buy. (This pack is about half the cost) So far these are working perfectly and show no signs of deficiency. As of now, I am extremely happy with this pack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quantity for the price
reviews.reviewText: Good that so many came in pack as they do not last very long when used continuously

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cost effective batteries. I use them for AirTags ring alarm sensors etc etc. tend to go through a lot with multiple different devices using them. Life expectancy is in line and in par with any of the other brands I’ve used so no issues there. These ones are easy open and don’t require scissors or anything to open other than your fingers. Other brands usually require scissors and are adult proof. So score for this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Battery performance was good however, they do not last long. Disappointed in the life of the battery. The fit of the battery is perfect. It fits right in and stays. Easy installation.Quality and durability I would say is good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: These kind of batteries I've always thought were the more expensive ones and they are and other stores even Walmart you can't get on as inexpensive as they are on Amazon I was very impressed I have several lights small lights that run off these kind of batteries the battery life is great the value the mount you get for your money is awesome and it's worth every penny I was very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Batteries that saved the world!
reviews.reviewText: Okay they may not have saved the world but they definitely work in my smoke alarms and guitar processors. Really good price for what I got I think. Now to see if they will power up my photon laser gun to kill off all those pesty aliens trying to take over the world!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend these batteries
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend these batteries. I have purchased them several times and never had any problems.. Sometimes they are stored for a while and they still work. I keep them in a separate plastic bag from the other batteries that I have. It's a great value for the money I use them for key fobs some of my grandsons toys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Finding these at a local store is very rare and very overpriced. I get these from Amazon for the cost and convenience. I COULD not be more pleased!! All of my candles and most of my remotes use these batteries so it is great to vet them when i need them!!
